protein.specific_function: May play a role in cell cycle regulation. Dual specificity phosphatase active toward substrates containing either phosphotyrosine or phosphoserine residues. Dephosphorylates CDK2 at 'Thr-160' in a cyclin-dependent manner.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle
regulation of cyclin-dependent protein kinase activity
